# The `DbgLabelRecord` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Records a position in IR for a source label (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilabel">DILabel</a>). <a href="#details">More...</a>

<CodeBlock>class llvm::DbgLabelRecord</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Records a position in IR for a source label (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilabel">DILabel</a>).

Corresponds to the llvm.dbg.label intrinsic.

Definition at line 231 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debugprograminstruction-h">DebugProgramInstruction.h</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debugprograminstruction-h/#l00260">260</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debugprograminstruction-h">DebugProgramInstruction.h</a>.

### createUnresolvedDbgLabelRecord() {#a5baa6360b3d00bdb8ccb84c306cf5088}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DbgLabelRecord &#42; llvm::DbgLabelRecord::createUnresolvedDbgLabelRecord (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42; Label, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42; DL)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
For use during parsing; creates a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbglabelrecord">DbgLabelRecord</a> from as-of-yet unresolved MDNodes.

Trying to access the resulting <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbglabelrecord">DbgLabelRecord</a>&#39;s fields before they are resolved, or if they resolve to the wrong type, will result in a crash.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debugprograminstruction-h/#l00246">246</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debugprograminstruction-h">DebugProgramInstruction.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debugprograminstruction-cpp/#l00156">156</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debugprograminstruction-cpp">DebugProgramInstruction.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
